::DarkMouse::

She finally opened her eyes and saw Scorponok standing over her with 
his laptop and the wires connected to her head.  She just stared at 
him for a moment.  She didn't know what to say.  She didn't know if 
she should thank him for returning her memory to her or curse at him 
for making her remember the things she wanted to forget.  She just 
sat there with a blank expression on her face looking at him.
The only thing that she could think to say was, "Why?"
